statements: SELECT * FROM image_events;
SELECT image_id, location, timestamp FROM image_events;
SELECT * FROM image_events WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, location FROM image_events WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, timestamp FROM image_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_events WHERE image_id = 1
SELECT location, timestamp FROM image_events WHERE image_id > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM image_events WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM image_events WHERE location LIKE '%paris%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS image_count, location FROM image_events GROUP BY location HAVING image_count > 1 ORDER BY image_count DESC
SELECT * FROM image_timestamps WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM image_timestamps WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM image_timestamps ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -80.0;
SELECT * FROM image_timestamps WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM image_timestamps WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 10.5 AND 20.5 AND longitude BETWEEN 30.5 AND 40.5;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, timestamp, camera_id FROM image_timestamps WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND camera_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ImageTimestamps;
SELECT id, capture_time, image_path FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_type, image_path FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE capture_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EventTimeline ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT id, event_time, event_details FROM EventTimeline WHERE event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT image_path FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE capture_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capture_time DESC
SELECT image_path, capture_time FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE event_type = 'natural_disaster' AND image_path LIKE '%forest%'
SELECT id, capture_time, event_type FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE event_type IN ('fire', 'flood') AND capture_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT image_path, capture_time, event_type FROM ImageTimestamps INNER JOIN LocationData ON ImageTimestamps.id = LocationData.image_id WHERE LocationData.latitude < 40.0 AND LocationData.longitude > -100.0 ORDER BY capture_time ASC
SELECT * FROM ImageTimestamps;
SELECT id, timestamp, image_url FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM ImageLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM EventTimeline WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT camera_name, installation_date FROM CameraSystem WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ImageTimestamps;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM ImageTimestamps WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM ImageLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description, timestamp FROM EventTimeline WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_name, installation_date FROM CameraSystem WHERE location_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM images WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT camera_id, camera_name FROM cameras WHERE location_point IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location_point FROM events ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_id, event_id FROM event_images WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM images WHERE location_point IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, timestamp FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE '%conference%';
SELECT camera_name, location_point FROM cameras WHERE ST_Distance(location_point, 'POINT(5.0 10.0)') < 100;
SELECT i.image_id, e.event_name, e.timestamp FROM event_images ei JOIN events e ON ei.event_id = e.event_id JOIN images i ON ei.image_id = i.image_id ORDER BY e.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
